moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nf6: Petrov's defence....I never faced it before.
moves.3... Nxe4: Gameknot database calls it Damiano variation of Petrov's defence....Was d6 better?
moves.4. Qe2: i follow the main line.....i think it's a good move.
moves.6... Qe7 7. dxe4 dxe4 8. Nfd2: I'm 2 points up in this way.
moves.12... Kh8 13. O-O Bc5 14. Ne4: this move defences f2, attacks Bc5 and open BSB.
moves.14... Bb6 15. Nbc3 Nc6 16. Nd5 Nd4 17. B: That knight is too advanced for me...
moves.24. Bxb7 Rdb8 25. Be4 Rba8 26. a3 Ra5 27: I try to increase my advantage.
moves.29. Rd8+ Rf8 30. Rxf8#: And the game ends. this is been my first Petrov's defence. I played it well? Please comment this game!
